message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
My turn! How about a 55-45 split? It's more than you offered me.
I can do 58-42, it's a better deal than my first offer!
Let's be reasonable. I'll come down a bit, 52-48?
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers, 56-44 is the best I can do
Time is running out, Alice!  I'm willing to be generous, but this is my final offer.
